headline: Air Products Announces Preliminary Q1FY25 GAAP EPS of $2.77 and Adjusted EPS of $2.86, Exceeding Company's Previous Adjusted EPS Guidance for the Quarter
summary: Air Products (NYSE:APD) today announced preliminary fiscal 2025 first quarter GAAP earnings per share# ("EPS") of $2.77 and preliminary fiscal 2025 first quarter adjusted EPS* of $2.86. Preliminary adjusted EPS exceeds the top end of the Company's previous fiscal 2025 first quarter adjusted EPS guidance* of $2.75 to $2.85.

content.title: Air Products Announces Preliminary Q1FY25 GAAP EPS of $2.77 and Adjusted EPS of $2.86, Exceeding Company's Previous Adjusted EPS Guidance for the Quarter

headline: Mantle Ridge's board nominees for Air Products get backing from Egan-Jones
summary: Recently, proxy advisory firms Institutional Shareholder Services and Glass Lewis have also backed Mantle Ridge, which has been pushing for changes at the company, including finding a new CEO and overhauling its strategy.  Mantle Ridge is asking shareholders to elect its nominees, including its founder Paul Hilal, to the nine-member board.

content.title: Mantle Ridge's board nominees for Air Products get backing from Egan-Jones
content.summary: Recently, proxy advisory firms Institutional Shareholder Services and Glass Lewis have also backed Mantle Ridge, which has been pushing for changes at the company, including finding a new CEO and overhauling its strategy.  Mantle Ridge is asking shareholders to elect its nominees, including its founder Paul Hilal, to the nine-member board.

headline: LEADING PROXY ADVISORY FIRM EGAN-JONES RECOMMENDS AIR PRODUCTS AND CHEMICALS, INC. SHAREHOLDERS VOTE "FOR" ALL FOUR MANTLE RIDGE DIRECTOR NOMINEES ANDREW EVANS, PAUL HILAL, TRACY MCKIBBEN, AND DENNIS REILLEY
summary: Mantle Ridge LP, which, together with its affiliates (collectively, "Mantle Ridge"), beneficially owns approximately $1.3 billion of the outstanding common shares of Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE: APD) ("Air Products" or the "Company"), today announced that Egan-Jones Proxy Services ("Egan-Jones"), a leading independent proxy advisory firm, has recommended that Air Products shareholders vote "FOR" the election of all four of Mantle Ridge's independent director nominees – Andrew Evans, P
